mapper.select: select `id`,`user_id`,`add_id`,`type_id`,`category_id`,`repair_time`,`details`,`add_time`,`money`,`statue`, repair_statue as repair_statue, service_charge as service_charge, replacement_item as replacement_item, price_goods as price_goods, repair_user_id as repair_user_id from t_repair where id = #{value}

select tr.id, tu.nickname, tu.phone, IFNULL(tu.heard_url,'/img/touxiang.png') as heardUrl, tmt1.`name` as typeName, tmt2.`name` as categoryName, date_format(tr.repair_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as repairTime, date_format(tr.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as addTime, tr.statue, tr.repair_statue, tup.address
from t_repair tr,t_user tu,t_maintain_type tmt1,t_maintain_type tmt2,t_user_plot tup where tr.user_id = tu.id and tr.type_id = tmt1.id and tr.category_id = tmt2.id and tr.add_id = tup.id and (tr.repair_statue = 1 or tr.repair_user_id = #{repair_user_id}) and tr.statue!=5 and tr.repair_statue = #{repairStatue} order by repair_statue,id desc

select tr.id, tu.nickname, tu.phone, IFNULL(tu.heard_url,'/img/touxiang.png') , tmt1.`name` as typeName, tmt2.`name` as categoryName, date_format(tr.repair_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as repairTime, date_format(tr.add_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as addTime, tr.statue, tr.repair_statue, tup.address, IFNULL(tr.service_charge,0) as service_charge, IFNULL(tr.replacement_item,'æ— ') as replacement_item, IFNULL(tr.price_goods,0) as price_goods, IFNULL(tr.money,0) as money, tr.repair_user_id, tr.details from t_repair tr,t_user tu,t_maintain_type tmt1,t_maintain_type tmt2,t_user_plot tup where tr.user_id = tu.id and tr.type_id = tmt1.id and tr.category_id = tmt2.id and tr.add_id = tup.id and tr.id = #{id}
select count(1) as num,IFNULL(SUM(money),0) as money from t_repair where repair_user_id = #{repair_user_id} and repair_statue = 5
